vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σαββᾰτ-ισμός, ὁ,
a keeping of days of rest, Ep. Hebrew 4.9,[Refs 1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Sabbath-rest, Sabbath observance; used with G3847 "a sabbath’s day journey" reckoned at 800 to 900 yards (2,000 cubits)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Sabbath-rest, Sabbath observance; used with G3847 "a sabbath’s day journey" reckoned at 800 to 900 yards (2,000 cubits)
primarily a keeping of a sabbath; a state of rest, a sabbath-state, Heb. 4:9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: un día sábado de descanso, día de reposo
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 安息日的安息, 安息日的遵守 (來4:9)
2) 指神的真敬拜者和真基督徒所盼望的將要來的可歇了勞苦愁煩的安息
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 安息日的安息, 安息日的遵守 (来4:9)
2) 指神的真敬拜者和真基督徒所盼望的将要来的可歇了劳苦愁烦的安息
